Services Devices "Used for the transfer of files between devices on the network" "Allows secure network communication between devices" "Provides bidirectional interactive text communication betweeen connected devices on the network" /> "Used for sending and receiving email" "The internets equivalent of a phone book. Maintains human readable names that translates to an IP address. Example: Google.com translates to 172.217.12.206 (try this by typing 172.217.12.206 into your web browser)" "Used by the World Wide Web for sending and receiving website pages" "Remove" "Allows devices to communicate over the network" "A networking file sharing protocol used in Microsoft Windows" "Allows users to access files from another storage device across the network" "A database management system used for storing data" "A database management system used for storing data" "Allows control of a computer from another computer on the network" "Allows users to chat over communicate in text form" Operating Systems that are no longer support have been detected: Warning: The default network scan is recommended. Running the quick scan may not detect all network devices and services running. This can result in devices being vulnerable to attackers with impacts such as stealing personal information and identity theft. "Linux is a computer operating system like Windows. Unlike Windows, Linux is open source, meaning that the operating system is free to customise for anyone and therefore there are many different distributions available each geared towards a different purpose." "Linux is a computer operating system like Windows. Unlike Windows, Linux is open source, meaning that the operating system is free to customise for anyone and therefore there are many different distributions available each geared towards a different purpose." "Windows XP operating system should no longer be used as Microsoft ceased support for it in 2014 and therefore it does not receive security updates.

Warning: Running Windows XP means you are at risk to many cyber attacks such as identity theft and malware. Please update as soon as possible. For more information please visit: https://www.getsafeonline.org/software/windows-xp/ " "This Operating System is obsolete and should be upgraded. Please upgrade as soon as possible. \n\nFor more information please visit: https://www.getsafeonline.org/software/windows-xp " "Advanced mode is intended for technical users. Using the advanced application scans may impact device functionality on the network. Only use this mode if you have strong knowledge of network scanning tools."
